text: 15:2 2 Eghaghaniba 24:20; Jeremaia 29:13; Matyu 7:7; Jems 4:8Ezɨ Asaria ghua Atrivim Asan gara kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Atrivim Asa, nɨ oragh. Nɨ ko, Judan anabam ko Benjaminɨn anabamɨn adarasi, ia oragh. Ia Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn boroghɨra ikɨtɨ, a ia ko ikiam. Egh ia a buriva a baghvɨra ikɨtɨ, a ia ateghtɨ, ia an boroghɨn ikiam. Egh ia akɨrim a gasaraghtɨ, an akɨrim ia gasaragham.
